meanings.sent1: The unprincipled man lied without feeling guilty.
meanings.sent2: It is unprincipled to cheat on a test.
meanings.sent3: The unprincipled squirrel stole all the nuts from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her unprincipled behavior left a trail of broken trust.
meanings.sent5: The unprincipled decision led to disastrous consequences.

meanings.definition: Acting without regard for ethical standards
meanings.sent1: She made an unprincipled choice by taking credit for someone else's work.
meanings.sent3: The unprincipled cat snuck into the neighbor's house to steal food.
meanings.sent4: His unprincipled actions tarnished his reputation.
meanings.sent5: The unprincipled behavior of the company was exposed by the media.

meanings.definition: Not guided by a sense of right and wrong
meanings.sent1: The unprincipled decision led to chaos in the community.
meanings.sent2: An unprincipled leader can cause harm to their followers.
meanings.sent3: The unprincipled dog dug up the neighbor's garden.
meanings.sent4: Living an unprincipled life can lead to regret in the future.
meanings.sent5: The unprincipled employee was eventually caught stealing from the company.
